remarks: The result of a matrix transformation is a constant polynomial matrix. (Contributed by AV, 18-Nov-2019.)  (Proof shortened by AV, 28-Nov-2019.)
statement:
m2cpm.s $e |- S = ( N ConstPolyMat R ) $.
m2cpm.t $e |- T = ( N matToPolyMat R ) $.
m2cpm.a $e |- A = ( N Mat R ) $.
m2cpm.b $e |- B = ( Base ` A ) $.
m2cpm $p |- ( ( N e. Fin /\ R e. Ring /\ M e. B ) -> ( T ` M ) e. S ) $.
